Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in October 2021. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. The cases of the COVID-19 pandemic was lowering later. World Health Organization weekly report:[22] WHO Weekly Report:[70] World Health Organization weekly report:[97] World Health Organization weekly report:[129] Countries and territories that confirmed their first cases during October 2021: By the end of October, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in October 2021 - Wikipedia
